name: Slime in Wonderland
description:
A short game that shows basic mechanics and cenarios for a top-down action rpg.

In this game you play as a Slime! 

Altough slimes are normally are portraited as weak creatures, you are able to grow and show them who's the weak one.

Consume enemies, get experience and level up diferent skill trees! Each tree contains a diferent set of skills with a theme, to provide variety of gameplay.

Note: This isn't a full game, so some skills won't have any real effect.
